item.title: I need help whit..JUST !READ!
item.dc:creator: @Tallien Tallien
item.description:
@Tallien wrote:

k sure here

Heres ::master for admins

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(486000000, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(486000000, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); addSkillXP(486000000, 7); addSkillXP(486000000, 8); addSkillXP(486000000, 9); addSkillXP(486000000, 10); addSkillXP(486000000, 11); addSkillXP(486000000, 12); addSkillXP(486000000, 13); addSkillXP(486000000, 14); addSkillXP(486000000, 15); addSkillXP(486000000, 16); addSkillXP(486000000, 17); addSkillXP(486000000, 18); addSkillXP(486000000, 19); addSkillXP(486000000, 20); addSkillXP(486000000, 21); addSkillXP(486000000, 22); addSkillXP(486000000, 23); addSkillXP(486000000, 24); sendMessage("Your stats have been maxed!");

Now for adminarmor

Step 1: add this as a command

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("adminarmor") && playerRights <= 2) {
addItem(5553, 1);
addItem(5554, 1);
addItem(5555, 1);
addItem(5556, 1);
addItem(5557, 1);
addItem(6818, 1);
sendMessage("This is teh Admin Armour....Check bonuses...Use only for emergencies...");
}

Step 2:

Open up item.cfg, Go Control F and type in Item = 5553

Step 3: Now replace Item = 5553-5557

With

item = 5553 Rogue_top Black_banded_leather_armour,_a_rogue's_dream! 999999.705478254989 999999.705478254989 999999.259314471631 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 item = 5554 Rogue_mask Black_banded_leather_armour,_a_rogue's_dream! 999999.705478254989 999999.705478254989 999999.259314471631 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 item = 5555 Rogue_trousers Black_banded_leather_armour,_a_rogue's_dream! 999999.705478254989 999999.705478254989 999999.259314471631 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 item = 5556 Rogue_gloves Black_banded_leather_gloves,_a_rogue's_dream! 999999.705478254989 999999.705478254989 999999.259314471631 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 item = 5557 Rogue_boots Black_banded_leather_boots,_a_rogue's_dream! 999999.705478254989 999999.705478254989 999999.259314471631500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000 500000

item.dc:creator: @Tallien Tallien
item.description:
@Tallien wrote:

ZZZpk:

How i can make admincommandmenu like ::admincommands or ::modcommands or whatever and why my commands doesn’t work my first command worked but when i maked other command that didin’t worked pls help me whit both things plssss!!! [br][size=1]Posted on: June 03, 2007, 01:18:32 PM[/size][hr]GUYS HELP ME fast :rolleyes: :rolleyes: :rolleyes: :eek: :eek: :eek: :mad: :mad: :

Here add this as a command

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("modhelp") && (playerRights >= 1)) { ModHelp(); }

And heres mine, just try to edit it a bit
And add this to your voids

public void ModHelp() { sendFrame126("@dre@Moderator Helpmenu", 8144); //Helpmenu title clearQuestInterface(); sendFrame126("", 8145); sendFrame126("@dre@", 8146); sendFrame126("@dbl@WebClient : look at www.moparisthebest.com/smf", 8147); sendFrame126("@dbl@Server Co-owner is:", 8148); sendFrame126("@dbl@I R Teh Leet", 8150); sendFrame126("@dre@Server Owner is:", 8151); sendFrame126("@dre@Spiffy", 8153); sendFrame126("@dre@- Commands -", 8154); sendFrame126("::xteletome (playername)", 8155); sendFrame126("::xteleto (playername)", 8156); sendFrame126("::kick (playername)", 8158); sendFrame126("@dre@- For Admins -", 8159); sendFrame126("::master ", 8160); sendFrame126("::adminarmor ", 8161); sendFrame126("::banuser (playername)", 8162); sendFrame126("::macrowarn (playername)", 8162); sendFrame126("::update (seconds)", 8164); sendFrame126("@dbl@@dre@~~ Enjoy ~~", 8164); sendFrame126("@dbl@Owners :@dre@ Spiffy", 8165); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); }
